title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.1 - Exclusion of horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.1 - Exclusion of horses

State Regulations

Horses on the steward's list shall be excluded from all
pari-mutuel races and, except where permitted by the presiding judge, from all
non-betting races. Unqualified horses shall be excluded from all pari-mutuel
races except stakes and early closing events. Blind horses shall be excluded
from all races. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4113.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 12, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 28, eff. 7/12/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
